Detailed Description

GPS class ... currently this only allows interacting with a serial port GPS sending continuous NMEA data

bool CRPGarmCom::isValid (  )  [inline]

check whether we seem to have a valid GPS

This function will only return meaningful data after a successful checksum is found, so a call to updataInfo preceding this function is advised!

char * CRPGarmCom::strstok ( char *  s,
const char *  delim 
) [protected]

tokenize GPS sentences

strtok() will skip multiple delimiters at once. We need a single delimiter at a time

bool CRPGarmCom::updateInfo ( bool  invalidate = false  ) 

update location info

This will read *one* set of GPS info and can be used to invalidate data before reading

Parameters:
invalidate [false] - if set to true, this will first invalidate previously stored data
